entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 36 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 02 March 2023
